twitch_info.title: M-Stage Grind: P4 - I wanna kill the kamilia 3 - M-Stage - Final Save!!! - Still not beaten

message.body: This is a lot earlier than my normal stream time on a saturday lmao
I woke up far earlier for some reason
i've died on platform twice today
i could beat it any minute now
btw platform fast spam strat when up in the sky falling down?
well not in the sky falling down, you know what I mean
If you're fearless against the boss once you reach the top of the screen it's super easy
yeah, since redire gave me the practice tool, i've been able to mess around a bit with platform
and i've taken a look at the later bosses
the only boss Ihad never seen before was Koala
until randomly seeing it in max's 100% video
and then playing it myself lmao
so I don't know why I didn't knowa bout it before.
yeah, i never saw it before ever until i watch max's video on it
it's a hidden gem in this game tbh
It was such a banger to have two excellent bosses back to back though
i haven't really taken a look at Influka either
i don't know much about it either
Influka's amazing but only if you're good at shmups
for me it was easy but
yeah I have alot of 2hu experience.
nearly got the crystal for the first time lfg
i was practicing outburst in dotkid in the practice and i could never get it once
2-3 hours of grinding to like learn
final is just rng so glhf hope you don't instagib
I think I died to final once lmao
I mechanically like this final save of M-Stage a lot though.
I'm not sure I like it all in a row, but as a design ye
I hope I never die to final in dotkid
it's not abig deal if you do but
sadly final in dotkid is rng hell so
I can't seem to learn how to do phase 3 in emperor
LUL that joke of a phase
all of the boss rush bosses have something inherently bs about them
piano's one was lmao imma wall you at random
phase 4 is much easier than phase 5 tho
and the nyou have final emperor phase which is hm
I actually first tried that phase in practice
But in actual attempts it took a couple times getting there.
piano is the toughest in BR
EX BR Emperor is the toughest.
i still wonder why they made EX piano the easiest EX BR boss
my first crystal collect of this save lfg
and same but they did buff EX Piano
EX Piano will prolly be the first EX BR boss Ido.
I'll be doing the 3 extra bosses first tho
the reason I'm not doing tokoroten last
is I want to enjoy the game when I finish it
wow that was a good attemt
I could beat this save today ngl
it's just don't choke segment which is easier
obvs annoying and easy to die to but ye
you could get some progress into kamilia today aswell
well if I reach kamilia I've basically won tbh
I'm pretty good at bosses after all
K3 destination is sometimes regarded as harder than kamilia
and I beat them in liek 4-5 hours so ye
This is the last hard part basically
EX will actually have challenging bosses
Tokoroten is actually really hard wtf
That's what I said EX will actually have challengeing bosses
not looking forward to tokoroten tho
I guess first crystal was fine
I didnt really remember it well
first crystal is kind of challenging
couple hours and we were guchi
ganing consistency slowly on reaching the crystal
I like the design of this save
I dont remember the aligns here, do you have an idea of what to go for?
I know what the aligns are for doing the main part
had max in the background just there LUL
I was looking for where that is coming from too LUL
its nice that you can take your time at the end with the crystal route
I know it made the climb at the right much more comfortable for me
I'm glad to beonf inal save tho for sure
plenty of grind time available today too
that jump after the double spikes at the bottom is the hardest part of this iirc
also the 2 corners after that I guess
those 2 corners are the hardest part for me
for some reason my practice tool strat
did you let go of left or something?
I normally hold into it so
it's like me to make these weird fails when I'm getting closer to clearing tho
yea that was still a good attempt
after that you do a short dropgate and 2 fjumps or something, not too much left
the hard part of the save is getting crystal and getting back
looking at max's video it's not too bad
just worried about failin git a bunch of times
remember how I forgot how to f-jump yesterday
and then when I rembered the save wa cleared in like half an hour to an hour
I Feel like I've died to every spike now
the 2 frame jump top right is pretty weird
I think I did a full jump into full jc, but I wouldnt go for that anymore
the 2f out from the middle is better imo
is annoying Im' failing it atm
not like I have a shortage of time to beat the save today so
this sav eis kind of relaxing
As much as I've liked M-Stage.
Definitely looking forward to reachingthe boss LUL
gonna feel so weird to get there ngl
To think only 4 years ago I didn't think I'd get here
I'm so ready to have like
make sure to grab the good align for the TAS ledge
but man this save is so annoying lmao
i practiced it in jtool with barely any issue tho
you arent sinking down enough rn
my expectation is at least another 4 hours onthis save
Considering everything I've done before this point, I find that kind of funny.  :)
Considering I've done everything you can do in the game prior to here.
I knew I'd have another dumb death. LUL
But that was a great PB! :D
I'm improving, that's a great sign. \o/
That adds to my dumb death counter LUL
Thanks a lot! Been on this save for a while
at least the worst is over
crystal makes this very hard LUL
nah kamilia will be fun tbh
I pretty much beat bosses in this game in 3-5 hours generally speaking.
cyber area was kinda annoying tho that took 5-6 to do initial clear
but then the crystal and rng wouldn't let me clear until 11-16 hours in
K3 destination took me about 4 hours 12 minutes
So generally speaking I should beat Kamilia in 4-6 hourrs, maybe 11-16 for the upper end.
not a lot of time, basically
yeah K3 destination was the easiest hidden boss for me
@Eradem this is probably one of the crazier clear times of yours
you cant really practice patch that either can you...
Sort of, the only thing I practiced was purple 3 actually
did you beat og desti already
yeah I got stuck on luka of all things
luka shit rin and len shit
like probably a year or two ago now
ok, I'm sure it would be easy now then
I could definitely beate them now ye
I'd stand a genuine chance with the EX bosses in K3 for sure
But the needle is what scares me
but yeah my K3 desti time is lmao
K3 Crimson was 9 hours 58 minutes. Destination 4 hours. Nue 11 hours. Gravity Man 12 hours.
crimson being more than Destie is weird
I never had a good time with crimson bosses
although that was also the case on my 2nd playthrough
yea I'm bad at crimson bosses too
I did beat vibe with the gods tho
you mean you don't find constantly having to double full jump for 5 mins fun??
I also quit crimson needle 2 on the boss
vibe with the gods is great aside from like
stuff fading around you so you have a sphere of invisibility around you
I saw a bit of the boss, looked annoying
the boss was honestly fun for me
the multiples of 3 thing was funny tohugh
K3 Crimson is legitimately worse than any other crimson boss I've played so
Don't use K3 Crimson as an example LUL
I still prefer it to the CN2 one, even if design is worse
I dislike all crimson bosses though
ye I'm not a fan of em either
you can get the odd exception here and there
I'd much rather be playing desti imo
desti is definitely in my top tier bosses for K3 so far
sorry if I asked before, but have you tried crazy destination?
I have not! Saw Max play it though!
ye I'll consider it at some point
lot of fun if you dont try to nohit
you got far though, it wasnt bad
oh hello Kinker, what an unexpected surprise!
This means CoolCat mode activated, right?
this is still just as nuts as yesterday
and ye I did get far Allen, and we still got plenty of time to get further :D
this game is insane for sure tho
at least it's final save right? :p
I know maze save exists but that's free
I'm just gonna use Max's video to destroy the maze LUL
you better grab the right aligns though for maze
I thought there were no needles in there
yea its one of the harder saves in the game Kappa
nah but in all srsness it's gonna be super ez
looking forward to the boss for sure tho
for a boss this hype it better be worth it LUL
only problem is the choke-y last phase
yea it will be just fine if you get to practice final
that attack is kinda an ordeal otherwise
what key normally lets you swap red and blue colours?
I tried to practice final phase for lulz once
yea its pretty hard no swap LUL
final phase is probably doable no swap
doable and want to do it is another thing though
there is no reason to learn that
actually am I even wrong in saying that
there arent that many swaps on the last phase
woot twice in a row?! nice
we're starting to reach tht consistency state
and a show of what my skill actually looks like lmfao
I don't know why I often fail to hit that
having to break a skill barrier
I'm wondering when I'll finally attain enough consistency to break that barrier.
At times I show the skill of someone who beat secret 5, guy tower crystal and tempest crystal.
But other times I just don't at all
thats the same for me xD
and I still suck anyway sometimes
I just feel there's more I'm caable of and can do
I just haven't broken into the next level yet.
ye I know I just mean
It's extremely obvious I /should/ be playing better
I'm wondering what I need to do to break past that
I dont think you are playing too badly on this save though
ye this is more a general thing I've noticed throughout my playthrough
I know I'm nearly there so-to speak but what will push past it
I guess we'll find out when the time comes :D
as far as I know you havent played that much needle yet
I mean I reached the boss of sunspike
completed gaze and its needle, beaten  vandal
beaten a dandy game and witch's needle tower thing
strawberry lollipop dandy that was the dandy one
thats not very much at all yea
I did beat spook jam and like a couple other things
I had at least a few hundred needle games cleared, with some pretty hard ones as well
I wanna travel do or die~Into the many world~ (Extra Beaten too)
I wanna come to the conclusion, not sure if that counts uh
NAMTG 100% ig it does have needle sections but it's yeah
when I was kinda new to fangames, I would pick random games off the wiki, since I didnt know about delfruit yet
I picked up a few messed up needles like that
like I wanna white needle, I wanna #
a bunch of K2 storm peak challenge games
I did all of stages 1, 2 & 3 in the savage mountain challenge
and then stopped on galaxy and GBLUL
I wouldnt want to play those either
I should grind out discord makers 2 at some point, but its kinda bruh
I have to do it anyway though its weird that I have not
I did have one attempt die on the sideways gate btw LUL
I think I saw that... yea I did
you could set it up and numpad it if you want
I could do a 1f cancel out and a full double jump to the platform
you cant 2 frame out of that
you can fulljump bonk though and fall through
got confused with timemachine 2 physics there
ye my standard strat is full jump bonk and fall through for the sideways gates
but the cancel one is appealing since it's reliable
you can use numpad to reliably do '2 buttons on 1 frame' jumps
do you not know that strat? if not I can explain
I taught you how to even do numpad didn't I :)
ok I'll open jtool to double check
it seems like I forgot how to do it
sorry I'll keep trying in the background
I'll add it to my cancelling techniques txt file once you remember and tell me :o
it might be possible that this doesnt work on some kbs
I can do it jumping left but not right on this kb
I may be doing the wrong thing here, but try holding shift, then numpad key, and then hold an arrow to jump?
I think this works fine on my other kb
I got it from Redire, my very well be remembering wrong tho
so you could bonk this way and then let go of the numpad and shift to do a 1f cancel after
at least that's what you've said even lets me do that seems remotely useful
it is supposed to be jump and right on same frame consistently
weird that it doesnt go right on this membrane kb
I think Redire uses this a lot in his runs
not a regular double jump tho
It's just hard to get right gotchu
yeah it can double jump nvm allen
what the hell are you doing
And PB is the sideways gate with crytal
testing out cancelling techniques ubur LUL
just a short break from the save is all
was investigating if I can cancel out of it reliably or if I should just full jump
ok I pulled out a different kb, on this one the numpad fulljump works both ways
surprsed it works on this one then
i used a different keyboard for secret 2 save 3
I'm lucky the numpad cancelling method in s2sa3 worked perfectly for me then
i am pretty sure it took longer figuring out how to do everything in save 3 than actually doing it
cause i spent forever doing the ceiling double diamond with the wrong align
that was my first time doing real cancelling
Not just tap both buttons cancel
bad align ceiling dia actually sucks, its like a double invert iirc
So it was a huge barrier of learning
and I spent like 5 hours or something learning
actual save itself was much easier LUL
it's also why I got round to watching kinataknight's videos
and looking up web forums from who knows when
kinata's old vids still have a lot of old info
he didnt know how to cactus at the time of those yet though
and there is of course no numpad
but the rest of the stuff is mostly there
If in 2 hours time I still haven't beaten this I'll do something else and continue this later/another time LUL
thats understandable, its not unlikely that you get this though in that time
if you remember how to F at least
be back soon going to get lunch GL
dying on that diagonal, that's a new one LUL
I must've not hit the align
I have delay, not hit align where?
to line up for the diag?
I believe I was 1 pixel off
maybe a couple more so ye
pls stop being too far left or right
it's a precise corner whichever way you do it
that's just the one I do better
I would usually touch the left wall there before corner
so I guess you tried both, thats good
point is it takes an input out of the window
which makes it easier to build muscle memory
ye but to me it's as mechanically precise either way
I often do stuff like that, make something frame perfect but reduce input number
but I don't like it myself
plus I am starting to get wayyy more consistent with this one
to me the other one feels more like rng tiing
this is definitely up thtere with the hard rukito saves
I think this was harder than Rukito for Jaimers, who was also struggling more on needle than bosses for obvious reasons
for me nah, only this save is harder than Rukito
That one other save I was stuck on for a long time was on par with rukito but not harder
Jaimers doing k3 was such a power move btw xD I remember seeing his k2 playthrough and 'k3 when' in the comments I was thinking 'yea sure'
but then he did it with like 0 fangame experience
that was the first time I saw someone struggle more on needle than bosses
I think if you start playing fangames and gain no boss skill or needle skill from elsewhere, the bosses are much harder
at least if your kb doenst blow
the bosses were much harder when I first started
and then I had my 2hu days
needle is the harder one now
I think I'm still worse at bosses than needle, even after a lot of touhou
much better than I was before touhou though
since it was for me too
i'm ridiculously worse at bosses than needle
I personally find it funny that I'm EX ready in avoidance/bosses
but needle I'm far, far from it
@3_headedmonkey if you ever feel like you are out of good bosses to play that are the right difficulty, I would recommend bullet hell games
and in some cases vice versa!
i enjoy RNG avoidance but am just not good at it
Decisive Taisa improved my reading skill in 2hu LUL
well I like RNG in avoidances but I don't like
which I am just so good at getting :/
like, semantic is very fun, but there's no way i can beat it right now
could be a memory address issue, might want the win10 fixer
another issue I've had is dmsynth.dll related
They updated dmsynth dll to not allow two sounds to be played at once (if it's the same file).
You have to stop and then start a sound to mimic playin git at once
I'm on a different pc, but I'll write these down and try
the old win7 dmsynth.dll fixes this issue
because it's before microsoft updated it
A game I play called Purple suffers the dmsynth crash
I fixed it with old dll xd
this can theoretically happen with timemachine 2 as well but it's super rare
my graphics card crashed because timemachine 2 was hooked into it
yeah you might know it but
That I have to make sure to open and clos eno new programs since the game was booted.
and if you crash like that
it's a full pc restart so
crashes like that are rare luckily
I havent played TTT2 though LUL
unless you're timemachine 2, and you bootup another program while it's running
You won't know until it's too late
it kinda sucks for me that this is an issue
But it's nob iggie if I'm careful
make sure to have the correct dmsynth.dll install before playing so if the music does SOMEHOW play both at once due to lag
I lost a speedrun to that once
the game's unstable on my pc to begin with anyway like
I get lag all the time it's monka
well not literally all the time
and it goes away every time I reset
I've seen computers with identical hardware
lag on the game wiht identical setups
lag on bosh? well I guess all I know is the 1 pc I have where it is fine
ye its fine for me as well but Witwix complained about that
when he was at ADGQ or smth
literally ONLY the laptop in the place
was able to run it without lag
ye it was weird to hear that
but I've observed the exact same problem with timemachine 2 (obviously not in ADGQ)
I observed it in some like college computer place where all the pcs were the same
and I was just going wtf
they were all win 7 pcs too
I think only one PC ran it well in the place as well
that I don't get smooth framerate with it on this pc
especially when it's a good game
needle requiring good kb pisses me off too
world 3 act 2 is pitch black except for a small light
NOT ALL MONITORS CAN EVEN SEE THATLIGHT
no matter the birghtness or contrast
unless a lightning storm happens to make the whole screen visible for a bit
So I've been allowed to use gamma changes on OBS and use that as my game screen for that act
plus it also helps the viewers actually see what's going on
but yeah so that act is monitor dependent
does that game have JC btw?
you aren't ever required to JC
I just JC sometimes to make things easier
technically jc is also not required in k3 I think
you just cancel to make 1 frame happen easier
Secrets 2 & 4 have the genuine JC requirements iirc
Well Secret 2 final save definitely does lmao
so what is aJC jump then?
yeah defo not available fo rme
that is not doable without 2 jump keys
I'd need another keyboard if I want to like
you can technically do all of k3 without knowing jumpcancelling exists
I think the downward planes also
I don't think I can 1 frame jump without cancelling on this kb unfortunately
World 5 Act 2 Screen 2 16 px save in Timemachine 2 lunatic (IWTTT2) well uh
There's a 2f required jump right at the end
couldn't 2f except like once in a blue moon
And that's why I was there for 60 hours
I know how that feels, is what I would have said
why didnt you get a kb earlier omg
Because I had no idea it was keyboard dependent
I didn't even know a 2f required good ekyboards.
I only found out much later
so you thought it was just an insane jump?
didnt you ask anyone why its so bad?
I think so but nobody told me lmao
Yeah, they all thought I had a good kb already
The reality? I had a shit kb that couldn't 2f like barely ever
I actually later tried the input viewer when learning about this
sur enough I never got a 2
no matter how many times I tried
So I ended up getting a new keyboard
and SINCE then that jump has been TRIVIAL
well glad thats in the past now then
when I had a bad kb I knew about 2 frames, I just couldnt get a good one for a while
if I knew that I'd have actually known why I was stuck for so long
fun-fact, timemachine 2 lunatic was the last time I pushed for a game clear as hard as K3 now
but yeah I'm getting nowhere on this save tonight
time to switch to smth else
my first clear that hard was, I think k3
ye my first hard clear is timemachine 2 lunatic
sorry if I distracted you too much from the needle
well that was a reallyg ood K3 grind session nonetheless and nah
you didn't, I was already not able to continue it anymore LUL
you did play quite well, its a hard save
